title: BookStore End-to-End Development
description: Built a comprehensive MERN stack web application to manage book inventory, supporting full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality and enabling users to seamlessly browse and update book details. Deployed the application on AWS EC2, ensuring a highly scalable and reliable cloud infrastructure
